Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Semester \Se*mes"ter\ (s[-e]*m[e^]s"t[~e]r), n. [G., from L. semestris half-yearly; sex six + mensis a month.] A period of six months; especially, a term in a college or university which divides the year into two terms. [1913 Webster]
semester n 1: one of two divisions of an academic year 2: half a year; a period of 6 months
